sentence.text: A total of nine non-coding variants on 11q13.5 predispose men to prostate cancer (PrCa). rs200331695 within the DNA repair intron is associated with aggressive PrCa and two high linkage disequilibrium (LD) groups of single-nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs) in the intergenic region are associated with PrCa death.

The high LD SNPs (rs143975731, rs12277366, rs2155225, and rs2155222) were associated with triglyceride biosynthetic process expression in both tumors sets (screening P = 0.035-0.043; validation P = 0.005-0.018).
